en.intro_connection: WhatsApp Web connects to your phone to sync messages. To reduce data usage, connect your phone to Wi-Fi.
en.web_undo_comment: If a chat is muted/archived, we show a small confirmation pop up. 'undo' is used to allow undo (unmute/unarchive)
en.if_unchecked_you_will_be_logged_out_afte: You'll be logged out after several minutes of inactivity
en.subject: Subject
en.computer_behind_proxy_comment: The computer is blocked from talking to whatsapp by either adware or over-zealous IT people
en.computer_behind_proxy: Your computer is connected to a network that prevents WhatsApp Web from working correctly
en.missing_photo_text: Can’t view this photo because it's no longer on your phone.
en.missing_video_text: Can’t play this video because it's no longer on your phone.
en.missing_audio_text: Can’t play this Voice Message because it's no longer on your phone.
en.guide_desktop_notifications_title_commen: Title of the popup requesting the user to enable desktop notifications on the browser
en.guide_desktop_notifications_description_: Description for requesting the user to enable desktop notifications on the browser.
en.guide_desktop_notifications_description: To get notifications for new messages, click “Allow” above.
en.guide_desktop_notifications_description_: To get notifications for new messages, select “Always show notifications” from the prompt below the URL bar.
en.guide_desktop_camera_description: To take photos, click “Allow” above to give WhatsApp Web access to your computer's camera.
en.guide_desktop_camera_description_firefox: To take photos, WhatsApp Web needs access to your computer’s camera. Select “Always share” from the prompt below the URL bar.
en.guide_desktop_mic_description: To record Voice Messages, click “Allow” above to give WhatsApp Web access to your computer's microphone.
en.guide_desktop_mic_description_firefox: To record Voice Messages, WhatsApp Web needs access to your computer’s microphone. Select “Always share” from the prompt below the URL bar. Note: selecting “Share selected device” won’t let you record Voice Messages.
en.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description: To take photos, WhatsApp Web needs access to your computer's camera. Click __chrome_media_error__ in the URL bar and choose “Always allow web.whatsapp.com to access your camera.”
en.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_fi: To take photos, WhatsApp Web needs access to your computer’s camera. Click __firefox_lock__ in the URL bar and set “Use the Camera” to “Allow.”
en.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_op: To take photos, WhatsApp Web needs access to your computer’s camera. Click __opera_media__ in the URL bar and click “Clear This Setting and Reload.”
en.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description: To record Voice Messages, WhatsApp Web needs access to your microphone. Click __chrome_media_error__ in the URL bar and choose “Always allow web.whatsapp.com to access your microphone.”
en.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_firef: To record Voice Messages, WhatsApp Web needs access to your computer’s microphone. Click __firefox_lock__ in the URL bar and set “Use the Microphone” to “Allow.”
en.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_opera: To record Voice Messages, WhatsApp Web needs access to your computer’s microphone. Click __opera_media__ in the URL bar and click “Clear This Setting and Reload.”
en.guide_desktop_camera_missing_description: You can’t take a photo because it looks like your computer doesn’t have a camera. Try connecting one or if you have one connected, try restarting your browser.
en.guide_desktop_mic_missing_description: You can’t record a Voice Message because it looks like your computer doesn’t have a microphone. Try connecting one or if you have one connected, try restarting your browser.
en.guide_help_faq: Click FAQ for help using WhatsApp Web.
en.guide_help_description_android: To contact support, open WhatsApp on your phone and tap Menu – Settings – Help – Contact us.
en.guide_help_description_symbian: To contact support, open WhatsApp on your phone and select Options - About - Contact support.
en.guide_help_description_bb: To contact support, open WhatsApp on your phone and tap Settings – About – Contact support.
en.guide_help_description_bbx: To contact support, open WhatsApp on your phone and swipe down from the top of the screen - Settings - Contact support.
en.guide_help_description_wp7: To contact support, open WhatsApp on your phone and tap menu (three dots at the bottom of the screen) – Settings – About – Contact support.
en.guide_help_description_s40: To contact support, open WhatsApp on your phone – swipe up from bottom – Settings - About - Options – Contact support.
en.turn_off_all_desktop_notifications_for: Turn off all desktop notifications for:
en.web_view_comment: In a conversation, used to view a location message without an address.
en.invalid_media_files_comment: Displayed if user tries to send an  image or video with an unsupported file type
en.invalid_media_files: WhatsApp Web doesn't support the type of image or video you tried adding. Try adding a different one.
en.image_too_big_comment: Displayed if user adds an image that's too large.
en.image_too_big: The image you tried adding is larger than the 16MB limit. Try adding a different one.
en.video_too_big_comment: Displayed if user adds an video that's too large.
en.video_too_big: The video you tried adding is larger than the 16MB limit. Try adding a different one.
en.option_select_mute: Turn off alerts and sounds for...
en.web_menuitem_mute_off_comment: Cancel group mute, button (should be 1 word)
en.web_group_info_comment: Group info, button, keep as short as possible [S]
en.web_list_info_comment: Broadcast list info, button, keep as short as possible [S]
en.web_contact_info_comment: Contact info, button, keep as short as possible [S]
en.no_chats_comment: The user has no chats to display [S]
en.all_chats_archived_comment: No chats are shown because they are all archived [S]
en.web_conversation_last_seen_today_comment: Someone's last seen. Web doesn't have space constraints like a phone, so please do not abbreviate.
en.web_conversation_last_seen_yesterday_com: Someone's last seen. Web doesn't have space constraints like a phone, so please do not abbreviate.
en.web_conversation_last_seen_date_comment: Someone's last seen. Web doesn't have space constraints like a phone, so please do not abbreviate.
en.web_you_created_list_unnamed: You created a broadcast list with __count__ recipient
en.web_you_created_list_unnamed_plural: You created a broadcast list with __count__ recipients
en.global_muted_1hour: Alerts and sounds off for 1 hour
en.global_muted_1day: Alerts and sounds off for 1 day
en.global_muted_1week: Alerts and sounds off for 1 week
en.global_unmute: Alerts and sounds off. Click to restore.
en.web_cannot_send_not_a_group_participant: You can't send messages to this group because you're no longer a participant.
en.web_cannot_send_to_blocked_contact_1: Can't send a message to blocked contact __contact__.
en.type_a_message_comment: placeholder hint in message composition box
en.default_group_message_notification_title: Desktop notifications show group title. This is default title if we don't have actual title
en.default_contact_message_notification_tit: Desktop notifications show contact name as title.  This is default if we don't have actual name
en.charge_phone_description: Charge your phone to keep using WhatsApp Web
en.make_sure_computer_active_internet_conne: Make sure your computer has an active Internet connection
en.make_sure_phone_active_internet_connecti: Part of a larger string that has a link to the faq article.
Make sure your phone has an active Internet connection.
en.phone_has_another_active_webclient_sessi: WhatsApp Web is open on another computer or browser. Click “Use Here” to use WhatsApp Web in this window.
en.whatsapp_web_is_open_in_another_window: WhatsApp Web is open in another window. Click “Use Here” to use WhatsApp Web in this window.
en.scan_code_with_phone_to_login: Use WhatsApp on your phone to scan the code
en.reduce_data_usage_connect_phone_to_wifi: To reduce data usage, connect your phone to Wi-Fi
en.blackberry_login_path: Open WhatsApp — Chats — Menu key — WhatsApp Web
en.nokia_s40_login_path: Open WhatsApp – Swipe up from bottom of screen – WhatsApp Web
en.bb10_login_path: Open WhatsApp — Swipe down from top of screen — WhatsApp Web
en.login_hint_version: Requires the latest version of WhatsApp
en.message_too_large_text: The message you’re pasting is too long. Try shortening it or sending it in multiple parts.
en.video_playback_not_supported: Your browser doesn’t support video playback.
en.audio_playback_not_supported: Your browser doesn’t support audio playback.
en.whatsapp_web_meta_description: Quickly send and receive WhatsApp messages right from your computer.
en.whatsapp_web_description: Send and receive WhatsApp messages right from your computer.
en.whatsapp_web_requirements: We recommend using WhatsApp Web with one of the following browsers:
en.whatsapp_safari_instructions: To start using WhatsApp Web, update Safari or use __chrome_homepage__, __firefox_homepage__, or __opera_homepage__.
en.whatsapp_safari_limited: To use all of WhatsApp Web's features like photo capturing and Voice Message recording, we recommend using __chrome_homepage__, __firefox_homepage__ or __opera_homepage__.
en.whatsapp_firefox_version: WhatsApp Web works with Mozilla Firefox 30+
en.whatsapp_firefox_instructions: To start using WhatsApp Web, update Firefox or use __chrome_homepage__, __safari_homepage__, or __opera_homepage__.
en.whatsapp_chrome_version: WhatsApp Web works with Google Chrome 36+
en.whatsapp_chrome_instructions: To start using WhatsApp Web, update Chrome or use __firefox_homepage__, __safari_homepage__, or __opera_homepage__.

az.guide_desktop_notifications_description_: Yeni ismarıclar barədə bildiriş almaq üçün, URL sətrindən “Həmişə bildirişləri göstər” seçin.
az.guide_desktop_camera_description_firefox: Şəkillər çəkmək üçün WhatsApp Web sizin kompüterinizdəki kameraya icazə istəyir. URL sətrinin altında “Həmişə paylaş” seçin.
az.guide_desktop_mic_description_firefox: Səsli İsmarıclar yazmaq üçün WhatsApp Web sizin kompüterinizdəki mikrofona icazə istəyir. URL sətrindən “Həmişə paylaş” seçin. Qeyd: “Seçilmiş qurğunu paylaş” seçməklə siz Səsli İsmarıc yaza bilmərsiniz.
az.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description: Şəkillər çəkmək üçün WhatsApp Web sizin kompüterinizdəki kameraya icazə istəyir. URL sətrində __chrome_media_error__ toxunaraq “web.whatsapp.com üçün kameya daimi icazə ver” seçin
az.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_fi: Şəkillər çəkmək üçün WhatsApp Web sizin kompüterinizdəki kameraya icazə istəyir. URL sətrində __firefox_lock__ toxunaraq “Kamera istifadəsi” üçün “İcazə ver” seçin.
az.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_op: Şəkillər çəkmək üçün WhatsApp Web sizin kompüterinizdəki kameraya icazə istəyir. URL sətrində __opera_media__ toxunaraq “Bu Tənzimələri Təmizlə və Yenidən Yüklə” seçin.
az.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description: Səsli İsmarıc yazmaq üçün WhatsApp Web sizin kompüterinizdəki mikrofona icazə istəyir. URL sətrində __chrome_media_error__ toxunaraq “web.whatsapp.com üçün mikrofona daimi icazə ver” seçin
az.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_firef: Səsli İsmarıclar yazmaq üçün, WhatsApp Web kompüterinizdəki mikrofondan istifadəyə icazəli olmalıdır. URL sətirində __firefox_lock__ toxunaraq “mikrofondan istifadə”yə “icazə” verin.
az.guide_desktop_camera_missing_description: Siz kompüterinizdə kameranın aşkarlanmaması səbəbindən şəkil çəkə bilmərsiniz. Kameranı qoşmağa çalışın, əgər qoşuludursa brauzerinizi bağlayıb yenidən açmağa cəhd edin.
az.guide_desktop_mic_missing_description: Siz kompüterinizdə mikrofonun aşkarlanmaması səbəbindən Səsli İsmarıc yaza bilmərsiniz. Mikrofonu qoşmağa çalışın, əgər qoşuludursa brauzerinizi bağlayıb yenidən açmağa cəhd edin.
az.message_too_large_text: Buferdən yapışdırmaq istədiyiniz ismarıc çox uzundur. Biraz qısaltmağa çalışın və ya hissə-hissə göndərməyə cəhd edin.
az.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_opera: Səsli İsmarıclar yazmaq üçün WhatsApp Web sizin kompüterinizdəki mikrofona icazə istəyir. URL sətrində __opera_media__ toxunaraq “Bu Tənzimləmələri Təmizlə və Yenidən Yüklə” seçin.

bg.intro_connection: WhatsApp Web се свързва с вашия телефон, за да синхронизира съобщенията. За да намалите мобилния трафик, свържете телефона към Wi-Fi.
bg.web_undo_comment:
If a chat is muted/archived, we show a small confirmation pop up. 'undo' is
used to allow undo (unmute/unarchive)
bg.web_menuitem_groupchat_comment: Create a new group chat, menu item
bg.if_unchecked_you_will_be_logged_out_afte: Ще бъдете отписани след няколко минути неактивност
bg.web_status_comment: The status menu icon, the Status screen title, anything that is a status
bg.subject: Тема
bg.web_contact_info_comment: Contact info, button, keep as short as possible [S]
bg.web_group_info_comment: Group info, button, keep as short as possible [S]
bg.missing_photo_text: Снимката не може да бъде прегледана, защото вече не е налична на вашия телефон.
bg.missing_video_text: Избраното видео не може да бъде прегледано, защото вече не е налично на вашия телефон.
bg.missing_audio_text: Гласовото Съобщение не може да бъде прослушано, защото вече не е налично на вашия телефон.
bg.guide_desktop_notifications_title_commen:
Title of the popup requesting the user to enable desktop notifications on
the browser
bg.guide_desktop_notifications_description: За да получавате известия при нови съобщения, натиснете бутона "Разрешаване" отгоре.
bg.guide_desktop_notifications_description_:
Description for requesting the user to enable desktop notifications on the
browser.
bg.guide_desktop_camera_description: Необходимо е да разрешите достъп на WhatsApp Web до вашата камера на компютъра, като натиснете "Разрешаване", за да правите снимки.
bg.guide_desktop_mic_description: Необходимо е да разрешите достъп на WhatsApp Web до вашия микрофон на компютъра, като натиснете "Разрешаване", за да изпращате Гласови Съобщения.
bg.guide_help_faq: За помощ при използване на WhatsApp Web натиснете ЧЗВ.
bg.guide_help_description_android: За да се свържете с представител за помощ, отворете WhatsApp на своя телефон и натиснете Меню – Настройки – Помощ – Свържете се с нас.
bg.guide_help_description_bb: За да се свържете с представител за помощ, отворете WhatsApp на своя телефон и натиснете Меню – Настройки – Помощ – Свържете се с нас.
bg.guide_help_description_bbx: За да се свържете с представител за помощ, отворете WhatsApp на своя телефон и провлачете от горната част на екрана – Настройки – Свържете се с нас.
bg.guide_help_description_wp7: За свързване със сътрудник отворете WhatsApp на вашия телефон и натиснете меню (три точици в долната част на екрана) – Настройки – За WhatsApp – Свързване с представител
bg.turn_off_all_desktop_notifications_for: Изключване на всички десктоп известия за:
bg.web_view_comment: In a conversation, used to view a location message without an address.
bg.invalid_media_files: WhatsApp Web не поддържа типа на снимката или видеото, което се опитахте да добавите. Опитайте да добавите други.
bg.invalid_media_files_comment:
Displayed if user tries to send an  image or video with an unsupported file
type
bg.image_too_big: Избраната снимка е по-голяма от 16MB. Опитайте да добави друга.
bg.image_too_big_comment: Displayed if user adds an image that's too large.
bg.video_too_big: Видеото, което се опитахте да добавите е по-голямо от разрешените 16МБ.Опитайте да добавите друго.
bg.video_too_big_comment: Displayed if user adds an video that's too large.

bg.web_conversation_name_is_composing_comme: text that is shown while the sender is typing [S]

bg.search_no_chats_or_contacts: Не са открити чатове или абонати
bg.no_chats_comment: The user has no chats to display [S]
bg.all_chats_archived_comment: No chats are shown because they are all archived [S]
bg.web_share_comment: Menu item for sharing media when long pressing a chat with media
bg.web_today_at_comment:
Text displayed in title bar for last seen time, %s replaced by "time_at"
string
bg.web_yesterday_at_comment: Text displayed in title bar for last seen time, %s replaced by time
bg.web_time_at_comment:
Continuation of text displayed in title bar for last seen time, %1$s is
replaced by the day (i.e. "Yesterday"), %2$s is replaced by the time
(formatted according to system settings)
bg.web_today_comment: Text displayed in title, keep short
bg.web_yesterday_comment: Text displayed in title, keep short
bg.web_group_subject_changed_by_you_comment: Event in the group chat when you change group subject to %1$s
bg.web_group_subject_changed_by_name_commen: Event in the group chat when participant %1$s changes group subject to %2$s
bg.web_group_participant_added_name_comment: Event in the group chat when %s (name) joins the group
bg.web_group_participant_added_you_comment: Event in the group chat when you join the group
bg.web_group_participant_removed_name_comme:
Event in the group chat when group participant %s (name) removed from the
group
bg.web_group_participant_removed_you_commen: Event in the group chat when you are removed from the group
bg.web_group_participant_left_name_comment: Event in the group chat when %s (name) leaves the group
bg.web_group_participant_left_you_comment: Event in the group chat when you left the group
bg.web_group_participant_changed_number_com:
%1$s is the name of the participant who changed their number; %2$s is the
old number; %3$s is the new number
bg.web_group_participant_changed_number_unk:
%1$s is the formatted number of the participant who changed their number;
%2$s is the new number
bg.web_group_participants_name_added_names_:
Event in the group chat when group admin %1$s (name) adds %2$s (name) to
the group
bg.web_group_participants_you_added_names_c: Event in the group chat when you add %s (name) to the group
bg.web_group_participants_name_removed_name:
Event in the group chat when group admin %1$s (name) removes %2$s (name)
from the group
bg.web_group_participants_you_removed_names: Event in the group chat when you remove %s (name) from the group
bg.web_group_participants_name_added_you_co: Event in the group chat when group admin %s (name) adds you to the group
bg.web_group_participants_name_removed_you_:
Event in the group chat when group admin %s (name) removes you from the
group
bg.web_group_participant_promoted_names_com:
Event in the group chat when group participant %s (name) is promoted to
group admins
bg.web_group_participant_demoted_names_comm:
Event in the group chat when group participant %s (name) is removed from
group admins
bg.web_group_participant_promoted_you_comme: Event in the group chat when you are promoted to group admins
bg.web_group_participant_demoted_you_commen: Event in the group chat when you are removed from group admins
bg.web_group_created_by_you_comment: Event in the group chat when you create the group with the subject %1$s
bg.web_group_created_by_name_comment:
Event in the group chat when %1$s (name) creates the group with the subject
%2$s
bg.web_group_ended_you_comment: Event in the group chat when you end the group
bg.web_group_ended_name_comment: Event in the group chat when group admin %s (name) ends the group
bg.web_mute_8hours_comment: Option to mute a group for 8 hours
bg.web_mute_1week_comment: Option to mute a group for one week
bg.web_mute_1year_comment: Option to mute a group for one year
bg.global_muted_1hour: Известията и звуците са изключени за 1 час
bg.global_muted_1day: Известия и звуци изключени за 1 ден
bg.global_muted_1week: Известия и звуци изключени за 1 седмица
bg.global_unmute: Известия и звуци изключени. Натиснете за включване.
bg.web_cannot_send_not_a_group_participant: Не може да изпращате повече съобщения към този чат, защото вече не сте участник.
bg.web_cannot_send_to_blocked_contact_1: Не може да изпратите съобщение до блокирания абонат __contact__.
bg.type_a_message_comment: placeholder hint in message composition box
bg.default_group_message_notification_title:
Desktop notifications show group title. This is default title if we don't
have actual title
bg.default_contact_message_notification_tit:
Desktop notifications show contact name as title.  This is default if we
don't have actual name
bg.click_to_update_whatsapp_web: Натисни за обновяване на WhatsApp Web
bg.charge_phone_description: Заредете телефона си, за да продължите да използвате WhatsApp Web
bg.make_sure_computer_active_internet_conne: Уверете се, че компютърът има активна интернет връзка
bg.make_sure_phone_active_internet_connecti: Уверете се, че телефонът ви има активна интернет връзка.
Part of a larger string that has a link to the faq article.
bg.phone_has_another_active_webclient_sessi: WhatsApp Web е отворен на друг компютър или браузър. Натиснете “Използвай Тук”, за да използвате WhatsApp Web в този прозорец.
bg.whatsapp_web_is_open_in_another_window: WhatsApp Web е отворен в друг прозорец. Натиснете “Използвай Тук”, за да използвате WhatsApp Web в този прозорец.
bg.click_to_reload_qr_code: Натиснете за презареждане на QR кода
bg.reduce_data_usage_connect_phone_to_wifi: За да намалите мобилния трафик, свържете телефона към Wi-Fi
bg.blackberry_login_path: Отворете WhatsApp — Чатове — Меню бутона — WhatsApp Web
bg.bb10_login_path: Отворете WhatsApp — Провлачете надолу от горната част на екрана — WhatsApp Web
bg.login_hint_version: Изисква се актуална версия на WhatsApp
bg.guide_help_description_s40: За да се свържете с представител за помощ, отворете WhatsApp на своя телефон — провлачете от долната част на екрана — Настройки - За приложението - Опции - Обслужване клиенти.
bg.nokia_s40_login_path: Отворете WhatsApp — Провлачете от долната част на екрана — WhatsApp Web
bg.guide_help_description_symbian: За да се свържете с представител за помощ, отворете WhatsApp на своя телефон и натиснете Опции - За приложението - Свържете се с нас.
bg.guide_desktop_notifications_description_: За да получавате известия при нови съобщения, натиснете "Винаги разрешавай известия" на съобщението под адресната лента.
bg.guide_desktop_camera_description_firefox: Необходимо е да разрешите достъп на WhatsApp Web до вашата камера на компютъра. Натиснете "Винаги разрешен" на съобщението под адресната лента.
bg.guide_desktop_mic_description_firefox: Необходимо е да разрешите достъп на WhatsApp Web до микрофона на вашия компютър. Натиснете “Винаги разрешен” на съобщението под адресната лента. Важно: избирайки “Share selected device” няма да позволи записването на Гласови Съобщения.
bg.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description: Необходимо е да разрешите достъп на WhatsApp Web до вашата камера на компютъра.Натиснете __chrome_media_error__ в адресната лента и изберете "Достъпът на web.whatsapp.com до камерата ви да продължава да е разрешен".
bg.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_fi: Необходимо е да разрешите достъп на WhatsApp Web до вашата камера на компютъра. Натиснете __firefox_lock__ в адресната лента и променете “Използване на камерата” на “Разрешаване”.
bg.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_op: Необходимо е да разрешите достъп на WhatsApp Web до вашата камера на компютъра. Натиснете __opera_media__ в адресната лента и изберете "Изчисти това и презареди".
bg.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description: Необходимо е да разрешите достъп на WhatsApp Web до микрофона на вашия компютър, за да записвате Гласови Съобщения..Натиснете __chrome_media_error__ в адресната лента и изберете "Достъпът на web.whatsapp.com до микрофона ви да продължава да е разрешен".
bg.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_firef: Необходимо е да разрешите достъп на WhatsApp Web до микрофона на вашия компютър. Натиснете __firefox_lock__ в адресната лента и променете “Използване на микрофона” на “Разрешаване”
bg.guide_desktop_camera_missing_description: Изглежда вашият компютър няма камера и затова не може да направите снимка. Включете камера или ако имате свързана, опитайте да рестартирате вашия браузър.
bg.guide_desktop_mic_missing_description: Изглежда вашият компютър не разполага с микрофон и затова не може да запишете Гласово съобщение. Включете микрофон или ако имате свързан, опитайте да рестартирате вашия браузър.
bg.message_too_large_text: Съобщението, което поставяте е твърде дълго. Опитайте се да го скъсите или да го изпратите на няколко части.
bg.video_playback_not_supported: Вашият браузър не поддържа видео възпроизвеждане.
bg.audio_playback_not_supported: Вашият браузър не поддържа аудио възпроизвеждане.
bg.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_opera: Необходимо е да разрешите достъп на WhatsApp Web до микрофона на вашия компютър. Натиснете __opera_media__ в адрес лентата и натиснете "Изчисти това и презареди".

bg.whatsapp_safari_limited: За да използвате всички възможности на WhatsApp Web, като заснемане на снимки и звукозапис, препоръчваме използването на __chrome_homepage__, __firefox_homepage__ или __opera_homepage__.

Part of a larger string that has a link to the faq article.
ca.phone_has_another_active_webclient_sessi: WhatsApp Web està obert en un altre ordinador o navegador. Clica “Utilitzar aquí” per fer servir WhatsApp Web en aquesta finestra.
ca.whatsapp_web_is_open_in_another_window: WhatsApp Web és obert a una altra finestra. Clica “Utilitzar aquí” per fer-ho en aquesta.
ca.click_to_reload_qr_code: Clica per recarregar el codi QR
ca.reduce_data_usage_connect_phone_to_wifi: Per reduir l'ús de dades, connecta el teu mòbil al Wi-Fi
ca.blackberry_login_path: Obre WhatsApp — Xats — Clau de menú — WhatsApp Web
ca.bb10_login_path: Obre WhatsApp — Llisca avall des d'adalt de la pantalla — WhatsApp Web
ca.login_hint_version: Requereix la darrera versió de WhatsApp
ca.guide_help_description_s40: Per contactar amb suport, obre WhatsApp al teu mòbil – llisca de dalt a abaix – Configuració - Sobre - Opcions – Contacta amb suport.
ca.nokia_s40_login_path: Obre WhatsApp – Llisca d'adalt a abaix – WhatsApp Web
ca.guide_help_description_symbian: Per contactar amb suport, obre WhatsApp al teu mòbil i tria Opcions - Sobre - Contactar amb suport.
ca.guide_desktop_notifications_description_: Per rebre notificacions de nous missatges, tria “Sempre mostrar notificacions” des del menú de sota la barra d'adreces.
ca.guide_desktop_camera_description_firefox: Per fer fotos, WhatsApp Web necessita accedir a la càmera del teu pc. Tria “Sempre compartir” des del menú de sota la barra d'adreces.
ca.guide_desktop_mic_description_firefox: Per gravar missatges de veu, WhatsApp Web necessita accedir al micròfon de l'ordinador. Tria “Sempre compartir” des del menú inferior sota la barra de direccions. Nota: triar “Compartir dispositiu triat” no et permetrà gravar missatges de veu.
ca.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description: Per fer fotos, WhatsApp Web necessita tenir accés a la càmera del teu ordinador. Clica __chrome_media_error__ a la barra d'adreces i tria “Permetre sempre web.whatsapp.com accedir a la càmera.”
ca.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_fi: Per fer fotos, WhatsApp Web necessita tenir accés a la càmera del teu ordinador. Clica __firefox_lock__ a la barra d'adreces i tria “Permetre” a “Utilitzar la càmera”.
ca.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_op: Per fer fotos, WhatsApp Web necessita accedir a la càmera del teu pc.Clica a __opera_media__ a la barra d'adreces i a “Reiniciar aquesta configuració i recarregar.”
ca.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description: Per gravar missatges de veu, WhatsApp Web necessita accedir al teu micròfon. Clica __chrome_media_error__ a la barra d'adreces i tria “Permetre sempre web.whatsapp.com per accedir al micròfon.”
ca.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_firef: Per gravar missatges de veu, WhatsApp Web necessita accedir al micròfon de l'ordinador. Clica __firefox_lock__ a la barra d'adreces i tria “Utilitzar el micròfon” a “Permetre”.
ca.guide_desktop_camera_missing_description: No pots fer fotos ja que sembla que l'equip no té càmera. Connecta'n una o si hi és connectada prova reiniciant el navegador.
ca.guide_desktop_mic_missing_description: No pots gravar missatges de veu, ja que sembla que l'equip no té cap micròfon. Connecta'n un o si hi és connectat, prova reiniciant el navegador.
ca.message_too_large_text: El missatge que enganxes és massa llarg. Prova a escurçar-lo o enviar-lo per parts.
ca.video_playback_not_supported: El navegador no suporta reproduir vídeo.
ca.audio_playback_not_supported: El teu navegador no suporta reproduir so.
ca.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_opera: Per gravar missatges de veu, WhatsApp Web necessita accedir al micròfon de l'ordinador. Clica a __opera_media__ a la barra d'adreces i a “Neteja la configuració i recarrega.”
ca.web_conversation_last_seen_today_comment:
Someone's last seen. Web doesn't have space constraints like a phone, so
please do not abbreviate.
ca.web_conversation_last_seen_yesterday_com:
Someone's last seen. Web doesn't have space constraints like a phone, so
please do not abbreviate.
ca.web_conversation_last_seen_date_comment:

please do not abbreviate.
ca.scan_code_with_phone_to_login: Utilitza WhatsApp al teu mòbil per escanejar el codi
ca.whatsapp_web_meta_description: Ràpidament rep i envia missatges de WhatsApp des del teu ordinador.
ca.whatsapp_web_description: Envia i rep missatges de WhatsApp des del teu ordinador.
ca.whatsapp_firefox_version: WhatsApp Web funciona amb Mozilla Firefox 30+
ca.whatsapp_chrome_version: WhatsApp Web funciona amb Google Chrome 36+
ca.whatsapp_safari_instructions: Per començar a utilitzar WhatsApp Web, actualitza Safari o utilitza __chrome_homepage__, __firefox_homepage__, o __opera_homepage__.
ca.whatsapp_firefox_instructions: Per començar a utilitzar WhatsApp Web, actualitza Firefox o utilitza __chrome_homepage__, __safari_homepage__, o __opera_homepage__.
ca.whatsapp_chrome_instructions: Per començar a utilitzar WhatsApp Web, actualitza Chrome o utilitza __firefox_homepage__, __safari_homepage__, o __opera_homepage__.
ca.cant_load_whatsapp: No es pot carregar WhatsApp Web
ca.computer_behind_proxy: El teu ordinador està connectat a una xarxa que preveu que no treballi correctament WhatsApp Web
ca.computer_behind_proxy_comment:
The computer is blocked from talking to whatsapp by either adware or over-
zealous IT people
ca.whatsapp_web_requirements: Et recomanem que utilitzis WhatsApp Web en un dels següents navegadors:
ca.whatsapp_safari_limited: Per utilitzar totes les prestacions de WhatsApp Web, com el fer fotos i la gravació de missatges de veu, recomanem utilitzar __chrome_homepage__, __firefox_homepage__ o __opera_homepage__.

cs.intro_connection: Funkce WhatsApp Web synchronizuje zprávy navázáním připojení k telefonu. Chcete li omezit spotřebu dat, připojte telefon k síti Wi-Fi.
cs.web_undo_comment:
If a chat is muted/archived, we show a small confirmation pop up. 'undo' is
used to allow undo (unmute/unarchive)
cs.web_menuitem_groupchat_comment: Create a new group chat, menu item
cs.if_unchecked_you_will_be_logged_out_afte: Po několika minutách neaktivity budete odhlášeni.
cs.web_status_comment: The status menu icon, the Status screen title, anything that is a status
cs.subject: Předmět
cs.web_contact_info_comment: Contact info, button, keep as short as possible [S]
cs.web_group_info_comment: Group info, button, keep as short as possible [S]
cs.missing_photo_text: Tuto fotografii nelze zobrazit, protože se již nenachází ve vašem telefonu.
cs.missing_video_text: Video nelze přehrát, protože se již nenachází ve vašem telefonu.
cs.missing_audio_text: Tuto hlasovou zprávu nelze přehrát, protože se již nenachází ve vašem telefonu.
cs.guide_desktop_notifications_title_commen:
Title of the popup requesting the user to enable desktop notifications on
the browser
cs.guide_desktop_notifications_description: Pokud chcete, aby vám byly oznamovány nové zprávy, klikněte v horní části okna na tlačítko „Povolit“.
cs.guide_desktop_notifications_description_:
Description for requesting the user to enable desktop notifications on the
browser.
cs.guide_desktop_camera_description: Chcete-li pořizovat fotografie, udělte funkci WhatsApp Web přístup ke kameře kliknutím na tlačítko „Povolit“.
cs.guide_desktop_mic_description: Chcete-li nahrávat hlasové zprávy, udělte funkci WhatsApp Web přístup k mikrofonu počítače kliknutím na tlačítko „Povolit“.
cs.guide_help_faq: Nápovědu k funkci WhatsApp Web zobrazíte kliknutím na odkaz Časté dotazy.
cs.guide_help_description_android: Chcete-li kontaktovat podporu, přejděte v telefonu do aplikace WhatsApp a klepněte na položky Nabídka – Nastavení – Nápověda – Kontaktujte nás.
cs.guide_help_description_bb: Chcete-li kontaktovat podporu, přejděte v telefonu do aplikace WhatsApp a klepněte na nabídky Nastavení – O aplikaci – Kontaktovat podporu.
cs.guide_help_description_bbx: Chcete-li kontaktovat podporu, přejděte v telefonu do aplikace WhatsApp, přejeďte prstem od horního kraje obrazovky směrem dolů – vyberte možnosti Nastavení – Kontaktovat podporu.
cs.guide_help_description_wp7: Chcete-li kontaktovat podporu, přejděte v telefonu do aplikace WhatsApp a klepněte na nabídku (tři tečky v dolní části obrazovky) – Nastavení – O aplikaci – Kontaktovat podporu.
cs.turn_off_all_desktop_notifications_for: Vypnout všechna oznámení plochy po dobu:
cs.web_view_comment: In a conversation, used to view a location message without an address.
cs.invalid_media_files: WhatsApp Web nepodporuje typ obrázku nebo videa, který chcete použít. Zkuste vybrat jiný.

cs.image_too_big: Obrázek, který chcete přidat, překračuje limit 16 MB. Zkuste vybrat jiný obrázek.
cs.image_too_big_comment: Displayed if user adds an image that's too large.
cs.video_too_big: Video, které chcete odeslat, překračuje 16MB limit velikosti. Zkuste použít jiné.
cs.video_too_big_comment: Displayed if user adds an video that's too large.

cs.phone_has_another_active_webclient_sessi: Funkce WhatsApp Web je používána v jiném počítači nebo prohlížeči. Chcete-li ji používat v tomto okně, klikněte na tlačítko „Používat zde“
cs.whatsapp_web_is_open_in_another_window: Funkce WhatsApp Web je již spuštěna v jiném okně. Chcete-li ji používat v tomto okně, klikněte na tlačítko „Používat zde“.
cs.reduce_data_usage_connect_phone_to_wifi: Chcete-li omezit využití dat, připojte telefon k síti Wi-Fi.
cs.android_login_path: Přejděte do nabídky WhatsApp – Nabídka – WhatsApp Web
cs.blackberry_login_path: Přejděte do nabídky WhatsApp – Chaty – tlačítko Menu – WhatsApp Web
cs.windows_phone_login_path: Přejděte do nabídky WhatsApp – Nabídka – WhatsApp Web
cs.nokia_symbian_s60_login_path: Přejděte do nabídky WhatsApp – Nabídka – WhatsApp Web
cs.bb10_login_path: Otevřete aplikaci WhatsApp – přejeďte prstem po obrazovce shora dolů – vyberte možnost WhatsApp Web
cs.login_hint_version: Vyžadována je nejnovější verze aplikace WhatsApp.
cs.guide_help_description_s40: Chcete-li kontaktovat podporu, přejděte v telefonu do aplikace WhatsApp – přejeďte prstem zdola nahoru – vyberte možnosti Nastavení – O aplikaci – Možnosti – Kontaktovat podporu.
cs.nokia_s40_login_path: Otevřete aplikaci WhatsApp – přejeďte prstem po obrazovce zdola nahoru – vyberte možnost WhatsApp Web.

cs.guide_desktop_notifications_description_: Pokud chcete, aby vám byla doručována oznámení o nových zprávách, klikněte na výzvě pod panelem adresy URL na možnost „Vždy zobrazovat oznámení“.
cs.guide_desktop_camera_description_firefox: Chcete-li pořizovat fotografie, funkce WhatsApp Web požaduje přístup ke kameře v počítači. Vyberte na panelu adresy URL možnost „Vždy sdílet“.
cs.guide_desktop_mic_description_firefox: Chcete-li nahrávat hlasové zprávy, funkce WhatsApp Web požaduje přístup k mikrofonu v počítači. Klikněte na výzvě zobrazené pod panelem adresy URL na možnost „Vždy sdílet“. Poznámka: Výběr možnosti „Sdílet vybrané zařízení“ neumožní nahrávat hlasové zprávy.
cs.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description: Chcete-li pořizovat fotografie, funkce WhatsApp Web požaduje přístup ke kameře počítače. Klikněte na panelu adresy URL na možnost __chrome_media_error__ a poté klikněte na možnost „Vždy povolit adrese web.whatsapp.com přístup ke kameře“.
cs.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_fi: Chcete-li pořizovat fotografie, funkce WhatsApp Web požaduje přístup ke kameře v počítači. Klikněte na panelu adresy URL na možnost __firefox_lock__ a změňte nastavení „Použít kameru“ na hodnotu „Povolit“.
cs.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_op: Chcete-li pořizovat fotografie, funkce WhatsApp Web požaduje přístup ke kameře v počítači. Klikněte na panelu adresy URL na možnost __opera_media__ a poté klikněte na možnost „Vymazat toto nastavení a načíst znovu“.
cs.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description: Chcete-li nahrávat hlasové zprávy, funkce WhatsApp Web požaduje přístup k mikrofonu. Klikněte na panelu adresy URL na možnost __chrome_media_error__ a vyberte možnost „Vždy povolit stránce web.whatsapp.com přístup k vašemu mikrofonu“.
cs.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_firef: Chcete-li nahrávat hlasové zprávy, funkce WhatsApp Web požaduje přístup k mikrofonu počítače. Klikněte na panelu adresy URL na možnost __firefox_lock__ a změňte nastavení „Použít mikrofon“ na hodnotu „Povolit“.
cs.guide_desktop_camera_missing_description: Nelze pořídit fotografii. Zdá se, že počítač nemá přístup ke kameře. Zkuste připojit kameru nebo pokud pokud je již připojena, restartujte prohlížeč.
cs.guide_desktop_mic_missing_description: Nelze nahrát hlasovou zprávu. Zdá se, že počítač nemá přístup k mikrofonu. Zkuste připojit mikrofon nebo pokud pokud je již připojen, restartujte prohlížeč.
cs.message_too_large_text: Zpráva, kterou chcete vložit, je příliš dlouhá. Zkuste ji zkrátit nebo poslat ve více částech.
cs.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_opera: Chcete-li nahrávat hlasové zprávy, funkce WhatsApp Web požaduje přístup k mikrofonu počítače. Klikněte na panelu adresy URL na možnost __opera_media__ a poté klikněte na možnost „Vymazat toto nastavení a načíst znovu“.
cs.web_conversation_last_seen_today_comment:
Someone's last seen. Web doesn't have space constraints like a phone, so
please do not abbreviate.

cs.scan_code_with_phone_to_login: Naskenujte kód pomocí aplikace WhatsApp v telefonu.
cs.whatsapp_web_meta_description: Odesílejte a přijímejte zprávy WhatsApp přímo z počítače.
cs.whatsapp_web_description: Odesílejte a přijímejte zprávy WhatsApp přímo z počítače.
cs.whatsapp_firefox_version: Funkce WhatsApp Web je podporována prohlížečem Firefox verze 30 a novější.
cs.whatsapp_chrome_version: Funkce WhatsApp Web je podporována prohlížečem Google Chrome verze 36 a novější.
cs.whatsapp_safari_version: WhatsApp Web je funkční se Safari verze 7 a novější.
cs.whatsapp_safari_instructions: Chcete-li používat funkci WhatsApp Web, aktualizujte Safari. Můžete také použít prohlížeče __chrome_homepage__, __firefox_homepage__ nebo __opera_homepage__.
cs.whatsapp_firefox_instructions: Chcete-li používat funkci WhatsApp Web, aktualizujte Firefox. Můžete také použít prohlížeče __chrome_homepage__, __safari_homepage__ nebo __opera_homepage__.
cs.whatsapp_chrome_instructions: Chcete-li používat funkci WhatsApp Web, aktualizujte Chrome. Můžete také použít prohlížeče __firefox_homepage__, __safari_homepage__ nebo __opera_homepage__.
cs.computer_behind_proxy: Váš počítač je připojen k síti, která brání bezchybnému používání funkce WhatsApp Web.
cs.computer_behind_proxy_comment:
The computer is blocked from talking to whatsapp by either adware or over-
zealous IT people
cs.whatsapp_web_requirements: Doporučujeme vám používat funkci WhatsApp Web s jedním z těchto prohlížečů:
cs.whatsapp_safari_limited: Chcete-li používat všechny funkce WhatsApp Web, včetně pořizování fotografií a záznamu hlasových zpráv, doporučujeme vám použít prohlížeč __chrome_homepage__, __firefox_homepage__ nebo __opera_homepage__.

et.intro_connection: WhatsApp Web on ühenduses sinu telefoniga, et sünkroniseerida sõnumeid. Et vähendada andmekasutust, ühenda oma telefon wifiga.

et.phone_has_another_active_webclient_sessi: WhatsApp Web on avatud teises arvutis või brauseris. Klõpsa "Kasuta siin", et kasutada WhatsApp Web'i selles aknas.

et.reduce_data_usage_connect_phone_to_wifi: Et vähendada andmesidekasutust, ühenda oma telefon Wifi võrku

et.bb10_login_path: Ava WhatsApp — Libista ekraani ülaosast alla — WhatsApp Web
et.login_hint_version: Vajalik on WhatsApp'i kõige värskem versioon

et.nokia_s40_login_path: Ava WhatsApp – Libista ekraanil alt üles – WhatsApp Web
et.guide_help_description_symbian: Et võtta ühendust klienditoega, ava oma telefonis WhatsApp ja seejärel Valikud - Teave - Võta ühendust klienditoega.
et.guide_desktop_notifications_description_: Et saada teavitusi uutest sõnumitest, vali "Näita alati teavitusi" aadressirea all ilmuval ribal.
et.guide_desktop_camera_description_firefox: Et teha pilte, vajab WhatsApp Web ligipääsu sinu arvuti kaamerale. Vali "Jaga alati" aadressirea all olevalt ribalt.
et.guide_desktop_mic_description_firefox: Et salvestada Häälsõnumeid, vajab WhatsApp Web ligipääsu sinu arvuti mikrofonile. Vali “Jaga alati” aadressiriba all olevalt ribalt. Märkus: valides “Jaga valitud seadet” ei lase sul salvestada Häälsõnumeid.
et.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description: Et teha pilte, vajab WhatsApp Web ligipääsu sinu arvuti kaamerale. Klõpsa aadressiribal __chrome_media_error__ ja vali "Luba alati web.whatsapp.com'ile ligipääs oma kaamerale"
et.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_fi: Et teha pilte, vajab WhatsApp Web ligipääsu sinu arvuti kaamerale. Klõpsa aadressiribal __firefox_lock__ ja säti “Kasuta kaamerat.” asendisse “Luba.”
et.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_op: Et teha pilte, vajab WhatsApp Web ligipääsu sinu arvuti kaamerale. Klõpsa aadressiribal __opera_media__ ja klõpsa "Kustuta see säte ja värskenda."
et.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description: Et salvestada Häälsõnumeid, vajab WhatsApp Web ligipääsu sinu mikrofonile. Klõpsa __chrome_media_error__ aadressiribal ja vali "Luba alati web.whatsapp.com'ile ligiääs oma mikrofonile."
et.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_firef: Et salvestada Häälsõnumeid, WhatsApp Web vajab ligipääsu sinu arvuti mikrofonile. Klõpsa __firefox_lock__ aadressiribal ja vali “Kasuta mikrofoni”, et “Lubada.”
et.guide_desktop_camera_missing_description: Sa ei saa teha pilte, sest paistab, et sinu arvutil ei ole kaamerat. Proovi see ühendada või kui sul on see ühendatud, proovi restartida oma brauser.
et.guide_desktop_mic_missing_description: Sa ei saa salvestada Häälsõnumit, sest tundub, et sinu arvutil ei ole mikrofoni. Proovi see ühendada või kui sa oled seda juba teinud, proovi restartida oma brauser.
et.message_too_large_text: Kleebitav sõnum on liiga pikk. Proovi seda lühendada või saata see mitme osana.
et.video_playback_not_supported: Sinu veebibrauser ei toeta videote mängimist.
et.audio_playback_not_supported: Sinu veebibrauser ei toeta heli mängimist.
et.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_opera: Et salvestada Häälsõnumeid, vajab WhatsApp Web ligipääsu sinu arvuti mikrofonile. Klõpsa aadressiriabal __opera_media__ ja seejärel klõpsa "Kustuta see säte ja laadi uuesti."

fr.guide_desktop_notifications_description_: Pour obtenir les notification pour les nouveaux messages, sélectionnez “Toujours afficher les notifications” à partir du message invité en dessous de la barre d'URL.
fr.guide_desktop_camera_description_firefox: Pour prendre les photos, WhatsApp Web a besoin d'accéder à l'appareil photo de votre ordinateur. Sélectionnez “Toujours partager” à partir du message invité en dessous de la barre d'URL.
fr.guide_desktop_mic_description_firefox: Pour enregistrer les Messages Vocaux, WhatsApp Web a besoin d'accéder au microphone de votre ordinateur. Sélectionnez “Toujours partager” à partir du message invité en dessous de la barre d'URL. Remarque : la sélection de “Partager l'appareil sélectionné” ne vous permet pas d'enregistrer les Messages Vocaux.
fr.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description: Pour prendre les photos, WhatsApp Web a besoin d'accéder à l'appareil photo de votre ordinateur. Cliquez sur __chrome_media_error__ dans la barre d'URL et choisissez “Toujours autoriser web.whatsapp.com pour accéder à votre appareil photo”.
fr.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_fi: Pour prendre les photos, WhatsApp Web a besoin d'accéder à l'appareil photo de votre ordinateur. Cliquez sur __firefox_lock__ dans la barre d'URL et configurez “Utiliser l'appareil photo” à “Autoriser”.
fr.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_op: Pour prendre les photos, WhatsApp Web a besoin d'accéder à l'appareil photo de votre ordinateur. Cliquez sur __opera_media__ dans la barre d'URL et cliquez “Effacer ce réglage et recharger”.
fr.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description: Pour enregistrer les Messages Vocaux, WhatsApp Web a besoin d'accéder au microphone de votre ordinateur. Cliquez sur __chrome_media_error__ dans la barre d'URL et choisissez “Toujours autoriser web.whatsapp.com pour accéder à votre microphone”.
fr.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_firef: Pour enregistrer les Messages Vocaux, WhatsApp Web a besoin d'accéder au microphone de votre ordinateur. Cliquez sur __firefox_lock__ dans la barre d'URL et configurez “Utiliser le Microphone” à “Autoriser”.
fr.guide_desktop_camera_missing_description: Vous ne pouvez pas enregistrer de Message Vocal parce que votre ordinateur semble ne pas être équipé d'un appareil photo. Essayez d'en connecter un ou si vous en avez déjà connecté, essayez de redémarrer votre navigateur.
fr.guide_desktop_mic_missing_description: Vous ne pouvez pas enregistrer de Message Vocal parce que votre ordinateur semble ne pas être équipé d'un microphone. Essayez d'en connecter un ou si vous en avez déjà connecté, essayez de redémarrer votre navigateur.
fr.message_too_large_text: Le message que vous collez est trop long. Essayez de le raccourcir ou de l'envoyer en plusieurs parties.
fr.video_playback_not_supported: Votre navigateur ne supporte pas la lecture vidéo.

fr.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_opera: Pour enregistrer les Messages Vocaux, WhatsApp Web a besoin d'accéder au microphone de votre ordinateur. Cliquez sur __opera_media__ dans la barre d'URL et cliquez “Effacer ce réglage et recharger”.

he.intro_connection: WhatsApp Web מתחבר למכשיר הטלפון שלך כדי לסנכרן הודעות. כדי להפחית את השימוש בתעבורת נתונים, חבר את מכשירך ל-Wi-Fi.
he.web_undo_comment:
If a chat is muted/archived, we show a small confirmation pop up. 'undo' is
used to allow undo (unmute/unarchive)
he.web_menuitem_groupchat_comment: Create a new group chat, menu item
he.if_unchecked_you_will_be_logged_out_afte: תנותק מהמערכת לאחר מספר דקות של חוסר פעילות

he.subject: נושא
he.web_contact_info_comment: Contact info, button, keep as short as possible [S]
he.web_group_info_comment: Group info, button, keep as short as possible [S]
he.missing_photo_text: לא ניתן להציג את התמונה הזו מפני שהיא איננה נמצאת יותר במכשירך.
he.missing_video_text: לא ניתן להפעיל את הוידאו מפני שהוא לא נמצא עוד במכשירך.
he.missing_audio_text: לא ניתן להשמיע הודעה קולית זו מפני שהיא איננה נמצאת עוד על מכשירך.

he.guide_desktop_notifications_description_:
Description for requesting the user to enable desktop notifications on the
browser.
he.guide_desktop_camera_description: על מנת לצלם תמונות, לחץ על "אפשר" כדי לתת ל-WhatsApp Web גישה למצלמה של המחשב שלך.
he.guide_desktop_mic_description: להקלטת הודעות קוליות, הקש על "Allow" למעלה כדי לתת ל-WhatsApp Web גישה למיקרופון במחשבך.
he.guide_help_faq: לחץ על שאלות נפוצות לעזרה בשימוש ב-WhatsApp Web.
he.guide_help_description_android: ליצירת קשר עם התמיכה, פתח את WhatsApp במכשיר הטלפון שלך והקש תפריט - הגדרות - עזרה - צור קשר.
he.guide_help_description_bb: ליצירת קשר עם התמיכה, פתח את WhatsApp במכשיר הטלפון שלך ולחץ על הגדרות - אודות - יצירת קשר עם התמיכה.
he.guide_help_description_bbx: ליצירת קשר עם התמיכה, פתח את WhatsApp במכשיר הטלפון שלך וגלול את המסך מלמעלה למטה - הגדרות - יצירת קשר עם התמיכה.
he.guide_help_description_wp7: ליצירת קשר עם התמיכה, פתח את WhatsApp במכשיר הטלפון שלך והקש על תפריט (שלוש הנקודות בתחתית המסך) - הגדרות - אודות - יצירת קשר עם התמיכה.
he.turn_off_all_desktop_notifications_for: כבה את כל התראות שולחן העבודה עבור:
he.web_view_comment: In a conversation, used to view a location message without an address.
he.invalid_media_files: WhatsApp Web לא תומך בסוג התמונה או הוידאו שניסית להוסיף. נסה להוסיף קובץ שונה.

he.image_too_big: התמונה שניסית לצרף גדולה ממגבלת 16MB. נסה לצרף תמונה אחרת.
he.image_too_big_comment: Displayed if user adds an image that's too large.
he.video_too_big: הוידאו שניסית להוסיף גדול ממגבלת 16MB. נסה להוסיף וידאו אחר.

he.guide_desktop_notifications_description_: לקבלת התראות על הודעות חדשות, יש לבחור "הצג התראות תמיד" בחלונית שמתחת לשורת הכתובת.
he.guide_desktop_camera_description_firefox: על מנת לצלם תמונות, WhatsApp Web צריך גישה למצלמת המחשב שלך. בחר "שתף תמיד" בחלונית שמתחת לשורת הכתובת.
he.guide_desktop_mic_description_firefox: להקלטת הודעות קוליות, WhatsApp Web צריך גישה למיקרופון של מחשבך. בחר "שתף תמיד" בחלונית מתחת לשורת הכתובת. שים לב: בחירה ב-"שתף התקן נבחר" לא תאפשר לך להקליט הודעות קוליות.
he.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description: על מנת לצלם תמונות, WhatsApp Web צריך גישה למצלמה של במחשבך. הקש על __chrome_media_error__ בשורת הכתובת ובחר "אפשר תמיד ל-web.whatsapp.com גישה למצלמה שלך."
he.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_fi: על מנת לצלם תמונות, WhatsApp Web צריך גישה למצלמה במחשבך. הקש על __firefox_lock__ בשורת הכתובת והגדר את "השתמש במצלמה" כ-"אפשר".
he.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_op: על מנת לצלם תמונות, WhatsApp Web צריך גישה למצלמת המחשב שלך. הקש על __opera_media__ בשורת הכתובת והקש על "נקה הגדרה זו וטען מחדש".
he.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description: על מנת להקליט הודעות קוליות, WhatsApp Web צריך גישה למיקרופון שלך. הקש על __chrome_media_error__ בשורת הכתובת ובחר "תמיד אפשר ל-web.whatsapp.com גישה למיקרופון שלך."
he.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_firef: על מנת להקליט הודעות קולית, WhatsApp Web זקוק לגישה למיקרופון של המחשב שלך. הקש על __firefox_lock__ בשורת הכתובת והגדר את "השתמש במיקרופון" כ-"אפשר."
he.guide_desktop_camera_missing_description: אינך יכול לצלם תמונה מפני שנראה כי למחשבך אין מצלמה. נסה לחבר מצלמה ; אם היא כבר מחוברת, נסה להפעיל מחדש את הדפדפן שלך.
he.guide_desktop_mic_missing_description: אינך יכול להקליט הודעה קולית מפני שנראה כי למחשבך אין מיקרופון. נסה לחבר מיקרופון ; אם הוא כבר מחובר, נסה להפעיל מחדש את הדפדפן שלך.

he.video_playback_not_supported: הדפדפן שלך אינו תומך בהצגת וידאו.
he.audio_playback_not_supported: הדפדפן שלך אינו תומך בניגון שמע.

hi.intro_connection: WhatsApp Web संदेशों को सिंक्रनाइज़ करने के लिए आपके फ़ोन को जोड़ता है। डेटा के उपयोग को कम करने के लिए, अपने फ़ोन को Wi-Fi से कनेक्ट करें ।
hi.web_undo_comment:
If a chat is muted/archived, we show a small confirmation pop up. 'undo' is
used to allow undo (unmute/unarchive)
hi.web_menuitem_groupchat_comment: Create a new group chat, menu item
hi.if_unchecked_you_will_be_logged_out_afte: आप निष्क्रियता के कई मिनट के बाद लॉग आउट हो जाएंगे
hi.web_status_comment: The status menu icon, the Status screen title, anything that is a status
hi.subject: विषय
hi.web_contact_info_comment: Contact info, button, keep as short as possible [S]
hi.web_group_info_comment: Group info, button, keep as short as possible [S]
hi.missing_photo_text: इस तस्वीर को देख नहीं सकते क्यूंकि यह आपके फोन पर अब नहीं है।
hi.missing_video_text: यह वीडियो चलाया नहीं जा सकता क्योंकि अब यह आपके फोन पर नहीं है।
hi.missing_audio_text: यह ध्वनि संदेश नहीं चलाया जा सकता क्योंकि यह आपके फोन पर अब नहीं है।
hi.guide_desktop_notifications_title_commen:
Title of the popup requesting the user to enable desktop notifications on
the browser
hi.guide_desktop_notifications_description: नए संदेशों के लिए सूचनाएं प्राप्त करने के लिए, ऊपर "अनुमति दें" पर क्लिक करें।
hi.guide_desktop_notifications_description_:
Description for requesting the user to enable desktop notifications on the
browser.
hi.guide_desktop_camera_description: तस्वीरें लेने के लिए, WhatsApp Web आपके कंप्यूटर के कैमरे के उपयोग लिए ऊपर "अनुमति दें" क्लिक करें।
hi.guide_desktop_mic_description: आवाज संदेश को दर्ज करने के लिए, WhatsApp Web आपके कंप्यूटर के माइक्रोफोन के उपयोग लिए ऊपर "अनुमति दें" क्लिक करें।
hi.guide_help_faq: WhatsApp Web के उपयोग में मदद के लिए अक्सर पूछे जाने वाले प्रश्न पर क्लिक करें।
hi.guide_help_description_android: समर्थन से संपर्क करने के लिए, अपने फोन पर WhatsApp खोलें और मेन्यू टैप करें - सेटिंग्स - सहायता - हमसे संपर्क करें।
hi.guide_help_description_bb: समर्थन से संपर्क करने के लिए, अपने फोन पर WhatsApp खोले और टैप करें सेटिंग्स - के बारे में - समर्थन को संपर्क करें।

hu.bb10_login_path: Nyisd meg: WhatsApp - Húzd le az ujjadat a képernyő tetejéről - WhatsApp Web
hu.charge_phone_description: Töltsd fel a telefonodat, hogy továbbra is használni tudd a WhatsApp Web-et
hu.missing_photo_text: A fotó megtekintése nem lehetséges, mivel már nem található meg a telefonodon.
hu.missing_video_text: A videó lejátszása nem lehetséges, mivel már nem található meg a telefonodon.
hu.missing_audio_text: A hangüzenet lejátszása nem lehetséges, mivel már nem található meg a telefonodon.
hu.global_muted_1hour: Figyelmeztetések és hangok kikapcsolása egy órára
hu.global_muted_1day: Figyelmeztetések és hangok kikapcsolása egy napra
hu.global_muted_1week: Figyelmeztetések és hangok kikapcsolása egy hétre
hu.global_unmute: Figyelmeztetések és hangok kikapcsolva. Kattints a visszaállításhoz.
hu.guide_help_description_s40: Hogy kapcsolatba tudj lépni az ügyfélszolgálattal, nyisd meg a WhatsApp-ot a telefonodon – húzd fel az ujjadat – Beállítások – Rólunk – Opciók – Írj az ügyfélszolgálatnak.
hu.nokia_s40_login_path: Nyisd meg a WhatsApp-ot – Húzd fel az ujjadat a képernyő aljáról – WhatsApp Web
hu.guide_help_description_symbian: Ahhoz, hogy írni tudj az ügyfélszolgálatnak, nyisd meg a WhatsApp-ot a telefonodon, majd válaszd: Opciók - Rólunk - Írj az ügyfélszolgálatnak.
hu.guide_desktop_notifications_description_: Ahhoz, hogy értesítéseket kapj új üzenetek érkezéséről, válaszd: “Mindig mutassa az értesítéseket” az URL sáv alatt megjelenő kérdésnél.
hu.guide_desktop_camera_description_firefox: Fotó készítéséhez a WhatsApp Web-nek hozzáféréshez van szüksége a számítógéped kamerájához. Válaszd: “Megosztás mindig” az URL sáv alatti kérdésnél.
hu.guide_desktop_mic_description_firefox: Hangüzenetek rögzítéséhez a WhatsApp Web-nek hozzáféréshez van szüksége a számítógéped mikrofonjához. Válaszd: “Megosztás mindig” az URL sáv alatt megjelenő kérdésnél. Megjegyzés: a “Kiválasztott eszközök megosztása” opció választásával nem lesz lehetőséged Hangüzenetek rögzítésére.
hu.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description: Fotók készítéséhez a WhatsApp Web-nek hozzáféréshez van szüksége a számítógéped kamerájához. Kattints__chrome_media_error__az URL sávban, majd válaszd “Mindig engedélyezze a web.whatsapp.com számára a hozzáférést a kamerához.”
hu.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_fi: Fotók készítéséhez a WhatsApp Web-nek hozzáféréshez van szüksége a számítógéped kamerájához. Kattints __firefox_lock__az URL sávban, majd állítsd a “Kamera használata” opciót erre: “Engedélyez”.
hu.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_op: Fotók készítéséhez a WhatsApp Web-nek hozzáféréshez van szüksége a számítógéped kamerájához. Kattints __opera_media__ az URL sávban, majd kattints “Hozzáférés megtagadása és újratöltés”.
hu.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description: Hangüzenetek rögzítéséhez a WhatsApp Web-nek hozzáféréshez van szüksége a mikrofonodhoz. Kattints__chrome_media_error__az URL mezőben, majd válaszd: “Mindig engedélyezze a web.whatsapp.com számára a hozzáférést a mikrofonomhoz”.
hu.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_firef: Hangüzenetek rögzítéséhez a WhatsApp Web-nek hozzáféréshez van szüksége a számítógéped mikrofonjához. Kattints__firefox_lock__az URL mezőben, majd állítsd a “Mikrofon használata” opciót: “Engedélyezés”.
hu.guide_desktop_camera_missing_description: Nem tudsz fotót készíteni, mivel úgy tűnik, hogy a számítógéped nem rendelkezik kamerával. Próbálj csatlakoztatni egyet, amennyiben már van csatlakoztatva, próbáld újraindítani a böngésződet.
hu.guide_desktop_mic_missing_description: A Hangüzenet rögzítése nem sikerült, mivel úgy tűnik a számítógéped nem rendelkezik mikrofonnal. Próbálj csatlakoztatni egyet, amennyiben már van csatlakoztatva, próbáld újraindítani a böngésződet.
hu.message_too_large_text: A beilleszteni kívánt üzenet túl hosszú. Próbáld lerövidíteni vagy részleteiben elküldeni.
hu.video_playback_not_supported: A böngésződ nem támogat videó visszajátszást.
hu.audio_playback_not_supported: A böngésződ nem támogat hang visszajátszást.
hu.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_opera: Hangüzenetek rögzítéséhez a WhatsApp Web-nek hozzáféréshez van szüksége a számítógéped mikrofonjához. Kattints__opera_media__az URL sávban, majd kattints: “Hozzáférés megtagadása és újratöltés”.
hu.web_conversation_last_seen_today_comment:
Someone's last seen. Web doesn't have space constraints like a phone, so
please do not abbreviate.
hu.web_conversation_last_seen_yesterday_com:
Someone's last seen. Web doesn't have space constraints like a phone, so
please do not abbreviate.
hu.web_conversation_last_seen_date_comment:
Someone's last seen. Web doesn't have space constraints like a phone, so
please do not abbreviate.
hu.scan_code_with_phone_to_login: Nyisd meg a WhatsApp-ot a telefonodon, hogy be tudd olvasni a kódot.
hu.whatsapp_web_meta_description: Gyorsabban küldhetsz és fogadhatsz WhatsApp üzeneteket a számítógépedről.
hu.whatsapp_web_description: Küldj és fogadj WhatsApp üzeneteket a számítógépedről.
hu.whatsapp_firefox_version: A WhatsApp Web-et használhatod: Web Mozilla Firefox 30+
hu.whatsapp_chrome_version: A WhatsApp Web-et használhatod: Google Chrome 36+
hu.whatsapp_safari_instructions: A WhatsApp Web használatához frissítsd a Safari böngésződet, vagy használj:__chrome_homepage__, __firefox_homepage__ vagy __opera_homepage__.
hu.whatsapp_firefox_instructions: A WhatsApp Web használatához frissítsd a Firefox böngésződet vagy használj: __chrome_homepage__, __safari_homepage__ vagy __opera_homepage__.
hu.whatsapp_chrome_instructions: A WhatsApp Web használatához frissítsd a Chrome böngésződet vagy használj: __firefox_homepage__, __safari_homepage__ vagy __opera_homepage__.
hu.cant_load_whatsapp: A WhatsApp Web betöltése nem sikerült
hu.computer_behind_proxy: A számítógéped egy olyan hálózatra van csatlakozva, ami gátolja a WhatsApp Web megfelelő működését.
hu.computer_behind_proxy_comment:
The computer is blocked from talking to whatsapp by either adware or over-
zealous IT people
hu.whatsapp_web_requirements: Azt ajánljuk, hogy a következő böngészők valamelyikével használd a WhatsApp Web-et:
hu.whatsapp_safari_limited: A WhatsApp Web összes szolgáltatásának használatához, mint például fotó készítése és hangüzenet rögzítése, azt ajánljuk, hogy __chrome_homepage__, __firefox_homepage__ vagy __opera_homepage__ böngészőt használj.

id.intro_connection: WhatsApp Web terhubung ke telepon Anda untuk mensinkronisasi pesan. Untuk mengurangi penggunaan data, hubungkan telepon Anda ke Wi-Fi.

id.web_status_comment: The status menu icon, the Status screen title, anything that is a status
id.web_contact_info_comment: Contact info, button, keep as short as possible [S]
id.web_group_info_comment: Group info, button, keep as short as possible [S]

id.web_mute_time_comment: Dialog title for mute a group chat time selection

Text displayed in title bar for last seen time, %s replaced by "time_at"

id.web_yesterday_at_comment: Text displayed in title bar for last seen time, %s replaced by time
id.web_time_at_comment:
Continuation of text displayed in title bar for last seen time, %1$s is
replaced by the day (i.e. "Yesterday"), %2$s is replaced by the time
(formatted according to system settings)
id.web_today_comment: Text displayed in title, keep short
id.web_yesterday_comment: Text displayed in title, keep short
id.web_you_created_list_unnamed: Anda telah membuat daftar siaran dengan __count__ penerima

id.web_group_subject_changed_by_name_commen: Event in the group chat when participant %1$s changes group subject to %2$s
id.web_group_participant_added_name_comment: Event in the group chat when %s (name) joins the group
id.web_group_participant_added_you_comment: Event in the group chat when you join the group

Event in the group chat when group participant %s (name) removed from the

id.web_group_participant_removed_you_commen: Event in the group chat when you are removed from the group
id.web_group_participant_left_name_comment: Event in the group chat when %s (name) leaves the group
id.web_group_participant_left_you_comment: Event in the group chat when you left the group
id.web_group_participant_changed_number_com:
%1$s is the name of the participant who changed their number; %2$s is the
old number; %3$s is the new number
id.web_group_participant_changed_number_unk:
%1$s is the formatted number of the participant who changed their number;
%2$s is the new number
id.web_group_participant_promoted_names_com:
Event in the group chat when group participant %s (name) is promoted to

id.web_group_participant_demoted_names_comm:
Event in the group chat when group participant %s (name) is removed from
group admins
id.web_group_participant_promoted_you_comme: Event in the group chat when you are promoted to group admins
id.web_group_participant_demoted_you_commen: Event in the group chat when you are removed from group admins
id.web_group_ended_you_comment: Event in the group chat when you end the group
id.web_group_ended_name_comment: Event in the group chat when group admin %s (name) ends the group
id.web_mute_8hours_comment: Option to mute a group for 8 hours
id.web_mute_1week_comment: Option to mute a group for one week
id.web_mute_1year_comment: Option to mute a group for one year
id.web_cannot_send_not_a_group_participant: Anda tidak dapat mengirim pesan ke grup ini karena Anda bukan lagi peserta.
id.web_cannot_send_to_blocked_contact_1: Tidak dapat mengirim pesan ke kontak __contact__ yang telah diblokir.
id.type_a_message_comment: placeholder hint in message composition box

Desktop notifications show group title. This is default title if we don't

Desktop notifications show contact name as title.  This is default if we

id.make_sure_computer_active_internet_conne: Pastikan bahwa komputer Anda memiliki koneksi internet aktif
id.web_undo_comment:
If a chat is muted/archived, we show a small confirmation pop up. 'undo' is
used to allow undo (unmute/unarchive)
id.subject: Subjek
id.invalid_media_files: WhatsApp Web tidak mendukung tipe gambar atau video yang sedang Anda tambahkan. Cobalah gunakan yang lain.

Displayed if user tries to send an  image or video with an unsupported file

id.video_too_big: Video yang Anda coba tambahkan melebihi batasan 16MB. Silakan coba video lainnya.

id.web_conversation_name_is_recording_comme: text that is shown while the sender is recording audio [S]
id.web_share_comment: Menu item for sharing media when long pressing a chat with media

Event in the group chat when group admin %1$s (name) adds %2$s (name) to

id.web_group_participants_you_added_names_c: Event in the group chat when you add %s (name) to the group
id.web_group_participants_name_removed_name:
Event in the group chat when group admin %1$s (name) removes %2$s (name)

id.whatsapp_web_is_open_in_another_window: WhatsApp Web sedang dibuka di jendela lain. Klik “Gunakan Di Sini” untuk menggunakan WhatsApp Web di jendela ini.
id.click_to_reload_qr_code: Klik untuk memuat ulang kode QR
id.reduce_data_usage_connect_phone_to_wifi: Untuk mengurangi penggunaan data, hubungkan telepon Anda ke Wi-Fi
id.guide_desktop_notifications_title_commen:
Title of the popup requesting the user to enable desktop notifications on
the browser
id.guide_desktop_notifications_description: Untuk mendapatkan pemberitahuan pesan baru, klik tombol “Izinkan” di atas.
id.guide_desktop_notifications_description_:
Description for requesting the user to enable desktop notifications on the
browser.
id.phone_has_another_active_webclient_sessi: WhatsApp Web sedang digunakan di komputer atau browser lain. Klik “Gunakan Di Sini” untuk menggunakan WhatsApp Web di jendela ini.
id.guide_desktop_camera_description: Untuk mengambil foto, klik “Izinkan” di atas untuk memberikan WhatsApp Web akses ke kamera komputer Anda.
id.web_view_comment: In a conversation, used to view a location message without an address.
id.if_unchecked_you_will_be_logged_out_afte: Anda akan keluar secara otomatis setelah beberapa menit tidak aktif
id.guide_desktop_mic_description: Untuk merekam Pesan Suara, klik “Izinkan” diatas untuk memberikan akses pada WhatsApp Web ke mikrofon komputer Anda.
id.guide_help_description_android: Untuk menghubungi dukungan, buka WhatsApp pada telepon Anda dan ketuk Menu - Setelan - Bantuan - Hubungi kami.
id.guide_help_description_bb: Untuk menghubungi dukungan, buka WhatsApp pada telepon Anda dan ketuk Setelan - Tentang - Hubungi dukungan.
id.guide_help_description_bbx: Untuk menghubungi dukungan, buka WhatsApp pada telepon Anda dan gesek ke bawah dari bagian atas layar - Setelan - Hubungi dukungan.
id.guide_help_description_wp7: Untuk menghubungi dukungan, buka WhatsApp pada telepon Anda dan ketuk menu (tiga titik pada bagian bawah layar) - Pengaturan - Tentang - Hubungi dukungan.
id.all_chats_archived_comment: No chats are shown because they are all archived [S]
id.make_sure_phone_active_internet_connecti: Pastikan bahwa telepon Anda memiliki koneksi Internet aktif.

id.intro_title: Pastikan telepon Anda terhubung ke Internet
id.guide_help_faq: Klik FAQ untuk bantuan dalam menggunakan WhatsApp Web
id.blackberry_login_path: Buka WhatsApp - Chatting - Tombol Menu - WhatsApp Web
id.bb10_login_path: Buka WhatsApp - Gesek ke bawah dari bagian atas layar - WhatsApp Web
id.charge_phone_description: Isi daya telepon Anda untuk tetap menggunakan WhatsApp Web
id.missing_photo_text: Tidak dapat membuka foto ini karena sudah tidak ada di ponsel Anda.
id.missing_video_text: Tidak dapat memutar video ini karena sudah tidak ada di ponsel Anda.
id.missing_audio_text: Tidak dapat memutar Pesan Suara ini karena sudah tidak ada di ponsel Anda.
id.global_muted_1hour: Peringatan dan nada dimatikan untuk 1 jam
id.global_muted_1day: Peringatan dan nada dimatikan untuk 1 hari
id.global_muted_1week: Peringatan dan nada dimatikan untuk 1 minggu
id.global_unmute: Peringatan dan nada dimatikan. Klik untuk memulihkannya.
id.guide_help_description_s40: Untuk menghubungi dukungan, buka WhatsApp pada telepon Anda - gesek ke atas dari bawah layar - Pengaturan - Tentang - Opsi - Hubungi dukungan.
id.nokia_s40_login_path: Buka WhatsApp - Gesek ke atas dari bagian bawah layar - WhatsApp Web
id.guide_help_description_symbian: Untuk menghubungi dukungan, buka WhatsApp pada telepon Anda dan pilih Opsi - Tentang - Hubungi dukungan.
id.guide_desktop_notifications_description_: Untuk mendapatkan pemberitahuan pesan baru, pilih “Selalu tampilkan pemberitahuan” dari menu yang muncul di bawah bar URL.
id.guide_desktop_camera_description_firefox: Untuk mengambil foto, WhatsApp Web memerlukan akses ke kamera komputer Anda. Pilih “Selalu Bagikan” dari menu yang muncul di bawah bar URL.
id.guide_desktop_mic_description_firefox: Untuk merekam Pesan Suara, WhatsApp Web memerlukan akses ke mikrofon komputer Anda. Pilih “Selalu Bagikan” dari menu yang muncul di bawah bar URL. Catatan: memilih “Bagikan Perangkat Terpilih” tidak akan membiarkan Anda untuk merekam Pesan Suara.
id.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description: Untuk mengambil foto, WhatsApp Web memerlukan akses ke kamera komputer Anda. Klik __chrome_media_error__ di bar URL dan pilih “Selalu izinkan web.whatsapp.com untuk mengakses kamera Anda.”
id.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_fi: Untuk mengambil foto, WhatsApp Web memerlukan akses ke kamera komputer Anda. Klik __firefox_lock__ di bar URL dan tetapkan “Menggunakan Kamera” ke “Izinkan.”
id.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_op: Untuk mengambil foto, WhatsApp Web memerlukan akses ke kamera komputer Anda. Klik __opera_media__ di bar URL dan klik “Hapus Pengaturan Ini dan Muat Ulang.”
id.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description: Untuk merekam Pesan Suara, WhatsApp Web memerlukan akses ke mikrofon Anda. Klik __chrome_media_error__ di bar URL dan pilih “Selalu izinkan web.whatsapp.com untuk mengakses mikrofon Anda.”
id.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_firef: Untuk merekan Pesan Suara, WhatsApp Web memerlukan akses ke mikrofon komputer Anda. Klik __firefox_lock__ pada bar URL dan tetapkan “Menggunakan Mikrofon” ke “Izinkan.”
id.guide_desktop_camera_missing_description: Anda tidak dapat mengambil foto karena tampaknya komputer Anda tidak memiliki kamera. Cobalah hubungkan sebuah kamera atau jika Anda memiliki sebuah kamera terhubung, silakan mulai ulang browser Anda.
id.guide_desktop_mic_missing_description: Anda tidak dapat merekam Pesan Suara karena tampaknya komputer Anda tidak memiliki sebuah mikrofon. Cobalah hubungkan sebuah mikrofon atau jika Anda memiliki sebuah mikrofon terhubung, silakan mulai ulang browser Anda.
id.message_too_large_text: Pesan yang Anda tempelkan terlalu panjang. Cobalah untuk mempersingkatnya atau mengirimkannya dalam beberapa bagian.
id.video_playback_not_supported: Browser Anda tidak mendukung pemutaran ulang video.
id.audio_playback_not_supported: Browser Anda tidak mendukung pemutaran ulang audio.
id.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_opera: Untuk merekam Pesan Suara, WhatsApp Web memerlukan akses ke mikrofon komputer Anda. Klik __opera_media__ pada bar URL dan klik “Hapus Pengaturan Ini dan Muat Ulang.”

it.guide_help_description_s40: Per contattare l'assistenza, apri WhatsApp sul tuo telefono - scorri dal basso verso l'alto - Impostazioni - Info - Opzioni - Contatta l'assistenza
it.nokia_s40_login_path: Apri WhatsApp — scorri verso la parte superiore dello schermo — WhatsApp Web
it.guide_help_description_symbian: Per contattare l'assistenza, apri WhatsApp sul tuo telefono e seleziona Opzioni - Info - Contatta l'assistenza.
it.guide_desktop_notifications_description_: Per ricevere le notifiche dei nuovi messaggi, seleziona “Visualizza sempre le notifiche” nell'avviso sotto alla barra degli indirizzi.
it.guide_desktop_camera_description_firefox: Per poter fare foto, WhatsApp Web necessita di accedere alla fotocamera del computer. Seleziona “Condividi sempre” nell'avviso sotto alla barra degli indirizzi.
it.guide_desktop_mic_description_firefox: Per poter registrare messaggi vocali, WhatsApp Web necessita di accedere al microfono del computer. Seleziona “Condividi sempre” nell'avviso sotto alla barra degli indirizzi. Nota: selezionare “Condividi dispositivo selezionato” non ti permetterà di registrare messaggi vocali.
it.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description: Per poter fare foto, WhatsApp Web necessita di accedere alla webcam del computer. Clicca __chrome_media_error__ nella barra degli indirizzi e imposta “Consenti sempre a web.whatsapp.com di accedere alla webcam.”
it.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_fi: Per poter fare foto,  WhatsApp Web necessita di accedere alla fotocamera del computer. Clicca __firefox_lock__ nella barra degli indirizzi e imposta “Utilizzare la fotocamera” su “Permetti”.
it.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_op: Per poter fare foto, WhatsApp Web necessita di accedere alla webcam del computer. Clicca __opera_media__ nella barra degli indirizzi e clicca “Cancella questa impostazione e ricarica”.
it.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description: Per poter registrare messaggi vocali, WhatsApp Web necessita di accedere al microfono del computer. Clicca __chrome_media_error__ nella barra degli indirizzi e scegli “Consenti sempre a web.whatsapp.com di accedere al microfono.”
it.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_firef: Per poter registrare messaggi vocali, WhatsApp Web necessita di accedere al microfono del computer. Clicca __firefox_lock__ nella barra degli indirizzi e imposta “Utilizzare il microfono” su “Permetti”.
it.guide_desktop_camera_missing_description: Non puoi fare foto perché il tuo computer non dispone di una webcam. Prova a collegarne una, o, se ne hai già una collegata, prova a riavviare il browser.
it.guide_desktop_mic_missing_description: Non puoi registrare messaggi vocali perché il tuo computer non dispone di un microfono. Prova a collegarne uno, o, se ne hai già uno collegato, prova a riavviare il browser.
it.message_too_large_text: Il messaggio che stai incollando è troppo lungo. Prova ad accorciarlo o a inviarlo in più parti.

it.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_opera: Per poter registrare messaggi vocali, WhatsApp Web necessita di accedere al microfono del computer. Clicca __opera_media__ nella barra degli indirizzi e clicca “Cancella questa impostazione e ricarica”.

ja.guide_help_description_s40: サポートセンターへのお問い合わせは、端末のWhatsApp を開き、下から上にスワイプ ― 「設定」 ― 「情報」 ― 「オプション」 ― 「お問い合わせ」を選択してください。

ja.guide_desktop_notifications_description_: 新着メッセージの通知を受けるには、URLバー下のオプションから「常に通知を表示する」を選択してください。
ja.guide_desktop_camera_description_firefox: 写真を撮影するには、WhatsApp Webはパソコンのカメラへのアクセスが必要です。URLバー下のオプションから「常に許可」を選択してください。
ja.guide_desktop_mic_description_firefox: ボイスメッセージを録音するには、WhatsApp Web はパソコンのマイクへのアクセスが必要です。URL バー下のオプションから「常に許可」を選択してください。注：「選択したデバイスを共有」を選択してもボイスメッセージの録音はできません。
ja.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description: 写真を撮影するには、WhatsApp Web はパソコンのカメラへのアクセスが必要です。URL バーの__chrome_media_error__ をクリックし、「web.whatsapp.comによるカメラへのアクセスを常に許可する」を選択してください。
ja.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_fi: 写真を撮影するには、WhatsApp Web はパソコンのカメラへのアクセスが必要です。URL バーの__firefox_lock__ をクリックし、「カメラを使用する」を「許可」に設定してください。
ja.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_op: 写真を撮影するには、WhatsApp Web はカメラへのアクセスが必要です。URL バーの__opera_media__ をクリックし「この設定を消去し再読み込み」を選択してください。
ja.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description: ボイスメッセージを録音するには、WhatsApp Web はパソコンのマイクへのアクセスが必要です。URL バーの__chrome_media_error__ をクリックし、「web.whatsapp.comによるマイクへのアクセスを常に許可する」を選択してください。
ja.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_firef: ボイスメッセージを録音するには、WhatsApp Web はパソコンのマイクへのアクセスが必要です。URL バーの__firefox_lock__ をクリックし、「マイクを使用する」を「許可」に設定してください。
ja.guide_desktop_camera_missing_description: パソコンにカメラが搭載されていないため写真を撮影できないようです。カメラを接続するか、あるいは接続済みの場合はブラウザを再起動してみてください。
ja.guide_desktop_mic_missing_description: パソコンにマイクが搭載されていないためボイスメッセージが録音できないようです。マイクを接続するか、あるいは接続済みの場合はブラウザを再起動してみてください。

lt.intro_title: Jūsų telefonas turi būti prijungtas prie interneto
lt.intro_connection: WhatsApp Web jungiasi prie jūsų telefono ir siunčia duomenis realiu laiku. Todėl įjungtas Wi-fi ryšys jūsų telefone yra geriausias pasirinkimas.
lt.web_undo_comment:
If a chat is muted/archived, we show a small confirmation pop up. 'undo' is
used to allow undo (unmute/unarchive)

lt.missing_audio_text: Negalima paleisti balso žinutės, nes ji buvo ištrinta iš telefono.

lt.guide_help_faq: Reikia pagalbos dėl WhatsApp Web? Spauskite DUK.
lt.guide_help_description_android: Norėdami susisiekti su Palaikymo Komanda, atsidarykite WhatsApp telefone, eikite į Meniu -> Nustatymai -> Pagalba -> Susisiekti.
lt.guide_help_description_bb: Norėdami susisiekti su Palaikymo Komanda, atsidarykite WhatsApp telefone, eikite į Nustatymai -> Apie -> Susisiekti su palaikymu.
lt.guide_help_description_bbx: Norėdami susisiekti su Palaikymo Komanda, atsidarykite WhatsApp telefone, braukite ekraną nuo viršaus -> Nustatymai -> Susisiekti su Palaikymu.
lt.guide_help_description_wp7: Norėdami susisiekti su Palaikymo Komanda, atsidarykite WhatsApp telefone, atsidarykite nustatymus (trys taškiukai dešinėje, apačioje, pagrindiniame lange) -> apie -> palaikymas.

lt.nokia_s40_login_path: Atsidarykite WhatsApp, tada braukite nuo ekrano apačios ir pasirinkite WhatsApp Web
lt.guide_help_description_symbian: Norėdami gauti pagalbos, atsidarykite WhatsApp savo telefone, pasirinkite Nustatymus -> Apie -> Susisiekti su pagalba.
lt.guide_desktop_notifications_description_: Norėdami gauti pranešimus apie naujas žinutes, pasirinkite "Visada rodyti pranešimus" žemiau adresų juostos.
lt.guide_desktop_camera_description_firefox: WhatsApp Web reikia prieigos prie jūsų kameros, kad galėtumėte nusifotografuoti. Pasirinkite "Visada dalintis" adresų juostos apačioje.
lt.guide_desktop_mic_description_firefox: Kad WhatsApp Web galėtų įrašyti Balso Žinutes, tinklapiui reikia leisti naudoti mikrofoną. Pasirinkite “Visada dalintis” žemiau adresų juostos. Dėmesio: pasirinkdami “Dalintis pasirinktu prietaisu” neleisite įrašinėti Balso pranešimų.
lt.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description: Norėdami leisti WhatsApp Web naudoti kompiuterio kamerą, spauskite __chrome_media_error__ adresų juostoje ir pasirinkite "Visada leisti web.whatsapp.com pasiekti kamerą."
lt.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_fi: WhatsApp Web reikia prieigos prie jūsų kameros, kad galėtumėte nusifotografuoti. Paspauskite __firefox_lock__ adresų juostoje ir pakeiskite “Naudoti kamerą” į “Leisti.”
lt.guide_desktop_camera_fail_description_op: WhatsApp Web reikia prieigos prie jūsų kameros, kad galėtumėte nusifotografuoti. Paspauskite __opera_media__ adresų juostoje ir pasirinkite "Ištrinti šį nustatymą ir perkrauti."
lt.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description: Norėdami leisti WhatsApp Web naudoti kompiuterio mikrofoną, spauskite __chrome_media_error__ adresų juostoje ir pasirinkite "Visada leisti web.whatsapp.com pasiekti mikrofoną."
lt.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_firef: WhatsApp Web reikia prieigos prie jūsų kompiuterio mikrofono. Spauskite __firefox_lock__ adresų juostoje ir nustatykite “Mikrofono naudojimą” į “Leisti.”
lt.guide_desktop_camera_missing_description: Panašu, kad prie kompiuterio neprijungta jokia kamera. Pabandykite prijungti iš naujo, jei esate prijungę ir paleiskite naršyklę iš naujo.
lt.guide_desktop_mic_missing_description: Negalite įrašyti balso žinutės, nes panašu, kad jūsų kompiuteris neturi mikrofono. Pabandykite prijungti iš naujo ir perkraukite naršyklę.
lt.message_too_large_text: Žinutė, kurią bandote įklijuoti yra per ilga. Bandykite ją sutrumpinti arba siųskite dalimis.
lt.video_playback_not_supported: Jūsų naršyklė nepalaiko vaizdo įrašų atkūrimo.
lt.guide_desktop_mic_fail_description_opera: WhatsApp Web reikia prieigos prie jūsų kompiuterio mikrofono. Spauskite __opera_media__ adresų juostoje ir pasirinkite "Išvalyti šį nustatymą ir perkrauti."
lt.web_conversation_last_seen_today_comment:
Someone's last seen. Web doesn't have space constraints like a phone, so
please do not abbreviate.

please do not abbreviate.
